sqlList.sql: select id, regchanel_code AS REGCHANELCODE, regchanel_name AS REGCHANELNM, create_time AS cdtime, update_time AS udtime from t_lm_b_regchanel
select id, platform_code AS PLATFORMCODE, platform_name AS PLATFORMNM, create_time AS cdtime, update_time AS udtime from t_lm_b_platform
select id, usergroup_name from t_lm_usergroup where usergroup_name=:USERGROUPNM

insert into t_lm_usergroup (id, usergroup_name, regist_start, regist_end, login_start, login_end, submit_order_from, submit_order_to, complete_order_from, complete_order_to, last_order_start, last_order_end, manual_add, create_time, update_time) values (:ID, :USERGROUPNAME, TO_DATE(:REGISTSTART, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'), TO_DATE(:REGISTEND, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'), TO_DATE(:LOGINSTART, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'), TO_DATE(:LOGINEND, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'), :SUBMITORDERFROM , :SUBMITORDERTO , :COMPLETEORDERFROM , :COMPLETEORDERTO , TO_DATE(:LASTORDERSTART, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'), TO_DATE(:LASTORDEREND, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'), :MANUALADD, sysdate, sysdate)

insert into t_lm_ugroup_rcl (id, usergroup_id, regchanel_code, create_time, update_time) SELECT t_lm_ugroup_b_rcl_seq.nextval, :USERGROUPID_RCL,REGEXP_SUBSTR (:REGCHANELCODE, '[^,]+', 1,rownum) AS Login_mobile, sysdate, sysdate FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= LENGTH (:REGCHANELCODE) - LENGTH (REPLACE (:REGCHANELCODE, ',', ''))

insert into t_lm_ugroup_ptm (id, usergroup_id, platform_code, create_time, update_time) SELECT t_lm_ugroup_b_rcl_seq.nextval, :USERGROUPID_PTM,REGEXP_SUBSTR (:PLATFORMCODE, '[^,]+', 1,rownum) AS Login_mobile, sysdate, sysdate FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= LENGTH (:PLATFORMCODE) - LENGTH (REPLACE (:PLATFORMCODE, ',', ''))

select tt.ID,tt.usergroup_name AS USERGROUPNAME, tt.CREATETIME, tt.USERCOUNT, (CASE tt.RegistTime WHEN '~' THEN '不限制' ELSE tt.RegistTime END ) as REGISTTIME, (CASE tt.LoginTime WHEN '~' THEN '不限制' ELSE tt.LoginTime END ) as LOGINTIME, (CASE tt.SubmitOrder WHEN '~' THEN '不限制' ELSE tt.SubmitOrder END ) as SUBMITORDER, (CASE tt.CompleteOrder WHEN '~' THEN '不限制' ELSE tt.CompleteOrder END ) as COMPLETEORDER from (select id, usergroup_name,to_char(create_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') as CreateTime, nvl(ult.counts，0) AS usercount , to_char(regist_start,'yyyy-mm-dd')||'~'||to_char(regist_end,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS RegistTime, to_char(login_start,'yyyy-mm-dd')||'~'||to_char(login_end,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS LoginTime, to_char(submit_order_from)||'~'||to_char(submit_order_to) AS SubmitOrder, to_char(complete_order_from)||'~'||to_char(complete_order_to) AS CompleteOrder from t_lm_usergroup left join (select usergroup_id, count(login_mobile) as counts from t_lm_ugroup_ult group by usergroup_id) ult on ult.usergroup_id = t_lm_usergroup.id order by create_time desc ) tt where rownum < 11

select tt.ID,tt.usergroup_name AS USERGROUPNAME, to_char(tt.create_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') as CREATETIME, tt.USERCOUNT, (CASE when tt.regchanelNm is null THEN '不限制' ELSE tt.regchanelNm END ) as REGCHANELNM, (CASE tt.SubmitOrder WHEN '~' THEN '不限制' ELSE tt.SubmitOrder END ) as SUBMITORDER from (select id, usergroup_name,t_lm_usergroup.create_time, nvl(ult.counts，0) AS usercount , reg.regchanelNm, to_char(submit_order_from)||'~'||to_char(submit_order_to) AS SubmitOrder from t_lm_usergroup left join ( select usergroup_id, count(login_mobile) as counts from t_lm_ugroup_ult group by usergroup_id) ult on ult.usergroup_id = t_lm_usergroup.id left join ( select usergroup_id,wm_concat(tbc.regchanel_name) AS regchanelNm from t_lm_ugroup_rcl urc inner join t_lm_b_regchanel tbc on tbc.regchanel_code=urc.regchanel_code group by usergroup_id) reg ON reg.usergroup_id = t_lm_usergroup.id order by create_time desc ) tt where ((:USERGROUPNAME IS NULL) OR (tt.usergroup_name LIKE '%'||:USERGROUPNAME||'%') OR (tt.ID LIKE '%'||:USERGROUPNAME||'%')) AND ((:StartDTime IS NULL) OR (to_date(:StartDTime, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tt.create_time)) AND ((:EndDTime IS NULL) OR (tt.create_time <= to_date(:EndDTime, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'))) AND ((:StartCount IS NULL) OR (TO_NUMBER(:StartCount) <= tt.USERCOUNT)) AND ((:EndCount IS NULL) OR (tt.USERCOUNT <= TO_NUMBER(:EndCount))) order by tt.create_time desc

select tt.ID, tt.usergroup_name AS USERGROUPNAME, (CASE when tt.regchanelNm is null THEN '不限制' ELSE tt.regchanelNm END ) as REGCHANELNM, (CASE when tt.platformNm is null THEN '不限制' ELSE tt.platformNm END ) as PLATFORMNM, (CASE tt.RegistTime WHEN '~' THEN '不限制' ELSE tt.RegistTime END ) as REGISTTIME, (CASE tt.LoginTime WHEN '~' THEN '不限制' ELSE tt.LoginTime END ) as LOGINTIME, (CASE tt.SubmitOrder WHEN '~' THEN '不限制' ELSE tt.SubmitOrder END ) as SUBMITORDER, (CASE tt.CompleteOrder WHEN '~' THEN '不限制' ELSE tt.CompleteOrder END ) as COMPLETEORDER, (CASE tt.LastOrder WHEN '~' THEN '不限制' ELSE tt.LastOrder END ) as LASTORDER, tt.manual_add AS MANUALADD, (CASE when tt.autoCount is null THEN 0 ELSE tt.autoCount END ) as AUTOCOUNT, (CASE when tt.manualCount is null THEN 0 ELSE tt.manualCount END ) as MANUALCOUNT from (select tlu.id, tlu.usergroup_name, reg.regchanelNm, ptm.platformNm, to_char(tlu.regist_start, 'yyyy.mm.dd')||'~'||to_char(tlu.regist_end, 'yyyy.mm.dd') AS RegistTime, to_char(tlu.login_start, 'yyyy.mm.dd')||'~'||to_char(tlu.login_end, 'yyyy.mm.dd') AS LoginTime, to_char(tlu.submit_order_from)||'~'||to_char(tlu.submit_order_to) AS SubmitOrder, to_char(tlu.complete_order_from)||'~'||to_char(tlu.complete_order_to) AS CompleteOrder, to_char(tlu.last_order_start, 'yyyy.mm.dd')||'~'||to_char(tlu.last_order_end, 'yyyy.mm.dd') AS LastOrder, tlu.manual_add,nvl(ulta.autoCount,0) + nvl(ultm.manualCount, 0) AS autoCount,ultm.manualCount from t_lm_usergroup tlu left join ( select usergroup_id,wm_concat(tbc.regchanel_name) AS regchanelNm from t_lm_ugroup_rcl urc inner join t_lm_b_regchanel tbc on tbc.regchanel_code=urc.regchanel_code group by usergroup_id) reg ON reg.usergroup_id = tlu.id left join ( select usergroup_id,wm_concat(tbp.platform_name) AS platformNm from t_lm_ugroup_ptm upm inner join t_lm_b_platform tbp on tbp.platform_code=upm.platform_code group by usergroup_id) ptm ON ptm.usergroup_id = tlu.id left join (select usergroup_id,count(Login_mobile) AS autoCount from t_lm_ugroup_ult where add_type='0' group by usergroup_id) ulta ON ulta.usergroup_id = tlu.id left join (select usergroup_id,count(Login_mobile) AS manualCount from t_lm_ugroup_ult where add_type='1' group by usergroup_id) ultm ON ultm.usergroup_id = tlu.id ) tt where tt.id = :USERGROUPID

select count(ult.login_mobile) from t_lm_usergroup ugp inner join t_lm_ugroup_ult ult on ugp.id=ult.usergroup_id left join t_lm_user ur on ur.login_mobile=ult.login_mobile left join (select count(id) AS allCount ,login_mobile from t_lm_order group by login_mobile) act on act.login_mobile=ult.login_mobile left join (select count(id) AS compleCount ,login_mobile from t_lm_order where ((price_code= 'LMBAR' and BOOK_STATUS=5) OR ((price_code= 'LMBAR2' OR price_code= 'BAR' OR price_code= 'BARB') AND (FOG_RESVTYPE='n' or FOG_RESVTYPE='e') AND book_status_other <> '3')) group by login_mobile) cpt on cpt.login_mobile=ult.login_mobile left join T_LM_B_REGCHANEL brl on brl.REGCHANEL_CODE=ur.REGCHANEL_CODE left join T_LM_B_PLATFORM ptm on ptm.PLATFORM_CODE=ur.PLATFORM_CODE where ugp.id=:USERGROUPID ORDER BY ult.id desc

select ult.login_mobile AS LOGINMOBILE,to_char(ur.createtime, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') AS CREATETIME ,brl.REGCHANEL_NAME AS REGCHANELNM, ptm.PLATFORM_NAME AS PLATFORMNM ,ur.SIGN_KEY,to_char(ur.sign_date, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') AS SIGNTIME, nvl(act.allCount, 0) AS ALLCOUNT,nvl(cpt.compleCount,0) AS COMPLECOUNT, ur.ID AS USERID from t_lm_usergroup ugp inner join t_lm_ugroup_ult ult on ugp.id=ult.usergroup_id left join t_lm_user ur on ur.login_mobile=ult.login_mobile left join (select count(id) AS allCount ,login_mobile from t_lm_order group by login_mobile) act on act.login_mobile=ult.login_mobile left join (select count(id) AS compleCount ,login_mobile from t_lm_order where ((price_code= 'LMBAR' and BOOK_STATUS=5) OR ((price_code= 'LMBAR2' OR price_code= 'BAR' OR price_code= 'BARB') AND (FOG_RESVTYPE='n' or FOG_RESVTYPE='e') AND book_status_other <> '3')) group by login_mobile) cpt on cpt.login_mobile=ult.login_mobile left join T_LM_B_REGCHANEL brl on brl.REGCHANEL_CODE=ur.REGCHANEL_CODE left join T_LM_B_PLATFORM ptm on ptm.PLATFORM_CODE=ur.PLATFORM_CODE where ugp.id=:USERGROUPID ORDER BY ult.id desc

select ult.login_mobile AS LOGINMOBILE,to_char(ur.createtime, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') AS CREATETIME ,brl.REGCHANEL_NAME AS REGCHANELNM, ptm.PLATFORM_NAME AS PLATFORMNM ,ur.SIGN_KEY,to_char(tlua.TODAYLOGIN, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') AS SIGNTIME, nvl(act.allCount, 0) AS ALLCOUNT,nvl(cpt.compleCount,0) AS COMPLECOUNT, ur.ID AS USERID from t_lm_usergroup ugp inner join t_lm_ugroup_ult ult on ugp.id=ult.usergroup_id left join t_lm_user ur on ur.login_mobile=ult.login_mobile left join (select count(id) AS allCount ,login_mobile from t_lm_order group by login_mobile) act on act.login_mobile=ult.login_mobile left join (select count(id) AS compleCount ,login_mobile from t_lm_order where ((price_code= 'LMBAR' and BOOK_STATUS=5) OR ((price_code= 'LMBAR2' OR price_code= 'BAR' OR price_code= 'BARB') AND (FOG_RESVTYPE='n' or FOG_RESVTYPE='e') AND book_status_other <> '3')) group by login_mobile) cpt on cpt.login_mobile=ult.login_mobile left join T_LM_B_REGCHANEL brl on brl.REGCHANEL_CODE=ur.REGCHANEL_CODE left join T_LM_B_PLATFORM ptm on ptm.PLATFORM_CODE=ur.PLATFORM_CODE left join (select t.mobile,max(t.today_login) AS TODAYLOGIN from t_lm_user_action t group by t.mobile) tlua on ult.login_mobile=tlua.mobile where ugp.id=:USERGROUPID ORDER BY ult.id desc

insert into t_lm_ugroup_ult (id, usergroup_id, login_mobile, add_type,create_time, update_time) select t_lm_ugroup_ult_seq.nextval,:USERGROUPID, userList.LOGINMOBILE, '0', sysdate, sysdate from (select * from (select ur.login_mobile AS LOGINMOBILE,ur.createtime ,ur.SIGN_KEY,ur.sign_date, nvl(act.allCount, 0) AS ALLCOUNT,nvl(cpt.compleCount,0) AS COMPLECOUNT, LastT.lastordertime, ur.regchanel_code,ur.platform_code,tlua.TODAYLOGIN from t_lm_user ur left join (select count(id) AS allCount ,login_mobile from t_lm_order group by login_mobile) act on act.login_mobile=ur.login_mobile left join (select count(id) AS compleCount ,login_mobile from t_lm_order where ((price_code= 'LMBAR' and BOOK_STATUS=5) OR ((price_code= 'LMBAR2' OR price_code= 'BAR' OR price_code= 'BARB') AND (FOG_RESVTYPE='n' or FOG_RESVTYPE='e') AND book_status_other <> '3')) group by login_mobile) cpt on cpt.login_mobile=ur.login_mobile left join (select lo.login_mobile,lo.CREATE_TIME AS lastordertime from t_lm_order lo inner join (select login_mobile,max(CREATE_TIME) as mCreateTime from t_lm_order group by login_mobile) ld on lo.login_mobile=ld.login_mobile and lo.CREATE_TIME=ld.mCreateTime) LastT on LastT.login_mobile=ur.login_mobile left join (select t.mobile,max(t.today_login) AS TODAYLOGIN from t_lm_user_action t group by t.mobile) tlua on ur.login_mobile=tlua.mobile ) tt where ((:REGISTSTART IS NULL) OR (to_date(:REGISTSTART, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tt.createtime)) AND ((:REGISTEND IS NULL) OR (tt.createtime<= to_date(:REGISTEND, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') )) AND ((:LOGINSTART IS NULL) OR (to_date(:LOGINSTART, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tt.TODAYLOGIN)) AND ((:LOGINEND IS NULL) OR (tt.TODAYLOGIN<= to_date(:LOGINEND, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') )) AND ((:SUBMITORDERFROM IS NULL) OR (to_number(:SUBMITORDERFROM) <= tt.ALLCOUNT)) AND ((:SUBMITORDERTO IS NULL) OR (tt.ALLCOUNT<= to_number(:SUBMITORDERTO) )) AND ((:COMPLETEORDERFROM IS NULL) OR (to_number(:COMPLETEORDERFROM) <= tt.COMPLECOUNT)) AND ((:COMPLETEORDERTO IS NULL) OR (tt.COMPLECOUNT<= to_number(:COMPLETEORDERTO) )) AND ((:LASTORDERSTART IS NULL) OR (to_date(:LASTORDERSTART, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tt.lastordertime)) AND ((:LASTORDEREND IS NULL) OR (tt.lastordertime<= to_date(:LASTORDEREND, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') )) AND ((:REGCHANNELLIST IS NULL) OR (tt.regchanel_code IN (SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR (:REGCHANNELLIST, '[^,]+', 1,rownum) FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= LENGTH (:REGCHANNELLIST) - LENGTH (REPLACE (:REGCHANNELLIST, ',', '')) +1))) AND ((:PLATFORMLIST IS NULL) OR (tt.platform_code IN (SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR (:PLATFORMLIST, '[^,]+', 1,rownum) FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= LENGTH (:PLATFORMLIST) - LENGTH (REPLACE (:PLATFORMLIST, ',', '')) +1) )) ) userList

merge into t_lm_ugroup_ult t1 using (SELECT :USERGROUPID as usergroup_id, REGEXP_SUBSTR (:MANUALADD, '[^,]+', 1,rownum) AS Login_mobile FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= LENGTH (:MANUALADD) - LENGTH (REPLACE (:MANUALADD, ',', '')) +1) t2 on (t1.usergroup_id = t2.usergroup_id and t1.login_mobile = t2.Login_mobile) when not matched then insert values (t_lm_ugroup_ult_seq.nextval, t2.usergroup_id, t2.Login_mobile,'1',sysdate,sysdate)
select Login_mobile AS Loginmobile from t_lm_usergroup tlu inner join t_lm_ugroup_ult ultm ON ultm.usergroup_id = tlu.id where tlu.usergroup_name=:USERGROUPNM
